string.text: the camp behind the waste graveyard
in the camp behind the waste graveyard
at the exit to the Garbage
at the factory in the north
at the passage to the Garbage
in the territory of the central complex
on the territory of the southern village
at the checkpoint behind the village
stalker from the Clear Sky faction
stalker from the Black Slugs faction
just recently appeared in the Zone
had some experience under his belt...
not the first time in the Zone
was one of the best in the Zone
was an expert in his field
Lucky not to let it get close, and
Thought of escaping - but nowhere to go. Well, and
lucky not to let it get close, and
thought of escaping - but nowhere to go. Well, and
Instead of legs - a horrible mess
Blood coming from nose and ears
Blood coming from nose and ears
Shortly before that, dropped the PDA, otherwise I wouldn't have been able to recognize it.
Recognized it by the damaged PDA.
Couldn't kill this beast, so, guys, be more careful.
Seems like shots from a pistol were heard
seems like shots from a pistol were heard
It seems like shots from a rifle were heard
shots from a rifle were heard, it seems
Turned the poor soul into a sieve
Turned the poor soul into a sieve
Heard bursts from an assault rifle
It seems shots were fired from an assault rifle
Heard bursts from an assault rifle
Heard bursts from an assault rifle
It seems shots were fired from an assault rifle
Heard bursts from an assault rifle
Seems like the grenade launcher went off
Grenade launcher went off, it seems
$kill_seen_a, how one stalker $killed_z $count $class. $level is where it happened. $fun_a.
"SOS"! $level. Got in a pinch, can't walk. Won't hold on long...
"SOS!" $level, got surrounded, out of medkits, almost no ammo left. Help please...
Help me out! $level, got surrounded! Won't hold on much longer!
Need immediate help! I won't hold on by myself! If anyone hears this, come to me! $level is my location.
I am big trouble. Utterly massive. $level. Help me out.
God damnit! How many of them is there?! Help me, I won't be able to take them alone! $level, trying to hold them off.
"SOS"! They got me by surprise, help! I think it was an ambush... $level currently, won't hold them off for long!
$level got an "SOS" signal! $name. Moving on bearing, those wishing to help please come.
SOS! $level got caught up, carrying the wounded $name! Men, help...
Attention all! $name got in a shootout. $level, my PDA got a SOS from there. If anyone is near, come help.
Help me out, damn it! We're about to get our asses ripped off! $level, we're surrounded! Son of a bitch, is anyone around?!
Someone help! We're in serious trouble, so if you can help us out! $level is where we are.
Shit, we're in big trouble here! We got a man down, $name, we're not gonna last much longer! $level, stuck.
We've got a bearing on an "SOS", $name sent it. Fuck, they were waiting for us! Help us, we can't hold out much longer!
SOS! $level, got in an ambush. Holding out so far, but not for long. Need help, I will be very grateful.
Received an SOS signal from some group of stalkers. All I could do was get a bearing, but the interference was bad... $level is the source of the signal. Anyone in the neighborhood, help me out.
Help me out, we've got a serious problem here, we've got a man down! $level is our coordinates.
Selling $item. $level, will be waiting for some time. Those that are interested, hurry up.
I'm giving away a certain item - $item. Not for free, of course. $level. Look me up there if you're interested.
I am selling an interesting thing - $item. $level for now. If you are interested, meet me there.
I have a certain "$item". $level, we can trade.
Selling such a thing as $item. $level, can negotiate the price with an interested party.
If anyone is interested in buying $item - I sell for the appropriate price. $level.
For reasonable money I will give $item. $level, waiting for buyers.
Selling $item. $level. Meet me, and hurry up or I'll change my mind.
I have $item. $level, I will sell for a reasonable price.
$level. Waiting for those who want to buy $item. The price is appropriate, but it is worth it.
Selling to whoever wants $item. $level. Cash only.
$level, I'll put $item in good hands. For a price, of course.
If anyone is interested, I can sell $item. It's a wonderful thing. $level currently.
If anyone's interested, I'm selling $item. Great stuff. $level, you'll find me.
Found some papers... It says: $item. $level. Anyone interested, hurry up, I'll sell it.

%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Messer, I hear you're interested in parts of the documents from the underground complexes. Well, I have something of interest for you. $item. $level, if you're up for it.
Found some interesting documents. It says on the cover - $item. Giving it away for a price. $level. Look me up there if you're interested.
$level, found some documents. It says: $item. Lucky me, maybe B will give a pretty good bang for his buck...
Found documents. It says $item. Selling for the appropriate price. $level.
Found $item. $level. Anyone interested, hurry up, I'll sell it.
Found such a thing as $item. I'll give it to you, of course, not for free. $level. Look for me there if you're interested.
$level,found $item. That's lucky, now to drag it to a trader...
I've got $item. $level is where I found it. Anyone interested, come on over.
Lucky me today. I found $item. $level is where it was. Whoever's interested, come on over.
Guys, hurry up, I found $item. $level. There may be more!
Ah, there's a good reason I went raiding today. Found $item. $level.
Damn, the informant was right! Found $item. $level.
Guys, I found an artifact. Looks like $item. Threw the bolt, walked quietly, picked it up. $level.
Shit, lucky me. Found $item. I'm selling it for the right price. $level.
Found $item. $level. Anyone interested, hurry up, I'll sell it.
Woah. Found $item. $level. That'll come in handy.
Lucky I found $item. $level. Looks like it's in good condition. It'll come in handy.
Uh, found some bones. $level. Must have been a massacre. There's $item lying around. I'll grab it.
Looks like I found someone's little stash. $level. And there's $item in there. Useful thing.
Got some cool guns. $item in excellent condition. If interested come over. $level.
Hm, going for a walk right now. $level. And I see it lying there. $item. Someone must have thrown it away. Well, I could use it.
Found $item. $level. Looks like the former owner got into a monster scare with nothing but bones.
What the hell happened last night? Did anyone hear? Or did I eat the wrong mushrooms?...
Maybe it wasn't the mushrooms, but whatever it was, it's hard to say. I caught that signal too. One thing's clear, I'm not signing up to go to the signal's source.
Guys, how do you explain to me that I heard it with the radio off? Just laid down, and then there's this crackling, voices... The radio's lying there, and the batteries are taken out...
Some damn thing, sitting quiet and peaceful by the fire, suddenly something roars by my ear. I grabbed the gun and dashed without looking back. Never heard anything like it here!
I heard something similar in the distance, seems it wasn't far from you. I'll go closer to the bar, it's getting uneasy in this area.
They say someone broke into the lab entrance, probably some creature crawled out.

DO NOT TURN ON the 8th channel on the transmitter at night! I barely got away... I'm crawling on my belly under the train cars at the railroad, flashlight off, a bloodsucker is wandering around nearby, can't find me but senses, like a dog, that I'm somewhere close. I'm crawling and trying to remember prayers. The eighth, usually silent... And then... Hissed, crackled, some voices... Don't turn on the eighth at night...
Haven't got used to it yet. Over time, you develop a habit of muting the radio in such moments.
Today's lucky, tomorrow might not be. You're not the first, you won't be the last.
Everyone, readiness level one. When the target is detected, open fire for effect.
Sergeant, it seems like a civilian here. A child about ten years old. In green... [connection error]...

There's some weird stuff happening under the Bright Light. I can clearly see light in some windows of the high-rises. It's as if someone's living there. Silhouettes are moving... I took out binoculars, looked - nothing. Empty apartment, no light. All covered in dust. Put away the binoculars - light again, silhouettes... Ghosts? Or am I losing it already?
Damn, I'm nearby... Need to bail before it's too late.
And yet, what's with the strange noise coming from the apartment in the Bar at night? Like the patter of children's feet on new parquet... And it's so tempting to go and see...
Yeah, right, it's rats! Stop writing nonsense.

Today I definitely got some gray hairs. Walking through anomalous fields. Bolts running out, sweat pouring... Ahead seems like a funnel, bald patches and electra shining on the sides. Where to go - not clear. Getting ready for the inevitable. And then - Lex! My late friend. Standing just beyond the funnel and beckoning me with his hand. Smirking...

What choice did I have? I shrugged it off - a reaction. And he stands, beckoning... I don't remember anything after that. Woke up buried under branches and all sorts of debris. Gun on a pole, backpack torn to shreds, loot scattered ten meters away, and not a scratch on me. Banged my head, that's all. Should put a hundred grams on Lex's grave... Saved me from the other side.
Guys, does anyone know what happened to Paravoz? We were on a raid, stopped for the night. I wake up, his gun, loot - all there, but he himself was nowhere to be seen... Everything's possible...
Has anyone seen Levka since he disappeared? This fool bet with Waffle last month that he could survive a night in the village cellar.
I saw him just a month ago. Said he was heading to Yantar, to that big village. Haven't seen him since then. Probably got cooked, I think.
Yeah... He was a fool, but a cheerful one.
Information for. Red-031. Phantom formations lose their properties in enclosed spaces.
Repeat. Take cover in buildings. End of communication.
They say they've seen the Saint near the bar again... Seems like he was heading towards the sprout...
Maybe... I heard he can take control of monsters through some kind of emitter... So it's better not to get close to him...
Damn... why did I end up camping here at the dump again... I wanted to reach the bar...
You're out of luck, buddy. I heard bandits have been disappearing there quite often lately. Near the hangar.
Has anyone heard about the psychos on Quiet Hills? They say they catch stalkers around the Zone who are interested in all kinds of documents. And then they burn them alive during their ritual...
It's better to stay away from there...
Guys, what are those closed green barrels? Scattered all over the Zone, wherever you look...
Damn if I know... the former bartender, when he was still alive, once told me secretly that they're some kind of bio-waste. Supposedly brought here from abroad.
Right now I'm standing near the swamp in the Bright Light. You won't believe it, but I hear music from the Pripyat side. Judging by the echo, it's playing from megaphones. What the hell?
Central, urgently dispatch a vehicle to the object on the Rostok factory premises. They've been spotted there again. End of communication.
...waiting for you, with your robber in room 237, in the center...
Witcher, I think I found it, I think I found the lamp... There are several of them throughout the Zone, that's for sure! And... it really shines, only...
Saw how a Moskvich started up on its own at the dump, drove about five meters, and stalled... What the hell?
In the dark valley, rumors have it there's an underground with dwarves who catch newcomers and then feed on them. That's why someone's always disappearing there...
Guys, right now in the Bright Light I found a pile of human bones. White bones, looks like someone boiled them... I'm getting out of here.

A.K. was at the checkpoint at 12:40. Conversation about fabric No. 6, control, engaged F. 21.01.11, call from Ms regarding deadlines. Asking to expedite, checkpoint is dissatisfied. Have they lost their minds?
Two new ones from Riga, to check. 23.01 sent 8 containers, 24.01 - 5 containers.
Here's some free advice - it's not worth eating raw meat. Otherwise, you'll end up like one of those with a bag over their head... or without it altogether...
Damn... again someone scared the hell out of my car's trunk... I find out who it is, - you're a corpse...
According to No. 54-9873 it's been done. 13.02 - isotopes. B.C. arrived, call directly, emergency - on 9. 14.02. Turned out to be a rare scoundrel. Check through Management. Wiretap
Guys, strange things happen at night... have you ever heard conversations?
Yeah. And it's unclear who it is... what's going on there? Some experiments, operations... and we don't even know, only part of it leaks out...
I think it's better for you not to know everything. You'll sleep more peacefully.
Penetrated the southern tunnel of the Object. Going down, will descend underground soon. Descended around the boiler room area. All quiet for now.
You're losing radio communication. Set up an external transmitter at the exit or continue transmitting textually, as you're doing now.
Alright. Yes, close the channel. We don't need any extra listeners, do we?

...[transmission error] block the tunnel, split into groups, and comb through the underground part of the Object. Maintain constant communication. If there's silence from any of the departed groups - everyone returns.
What... [transmission error] ...that might appear? During the last descent, an entire reconnaissance group disappeared.

As for protective measures, there are... [transmission error] ...resident here, then... [transmission error] ...none found. Don't go too far. Point of no return - two hours. After that, we're leaving.
Group, immediately get in touch. I repeat, immediately. We have to leave in six minutes, before it starts.
ZX-08, your order is complete. Reports on the subjects are in the case. Over.
Sector B-52. Hold on, seems like the channel is being monitored...
Red 435, have you secured the object?
What nonsense? Birds sing at night in the Cordon...
...it's the only safe place in the Zone, that's why they sing there...
What the hell? Birds sing at night in the Cordon... Heard that controllers have been spotted there often lately...
...my advice to you - get out of there...
Have you seen the messages from the Radar? How is that possible?
...interference may be possible... maybe it's not coming from there...
Guys, there's some yellow haze constantly before my eyes. What's going on?
You've got radiation sickness. Use anti-rad, or seek treatment from the scientists.
Folks, what the hell? Went to Toad, but his shack's boarded up, and inside the shack looks like a skeleton... and everything's glowing red... What the... hey, kid!
The dawn is breaking... I think it's time to go.
Folks, it's getting light here - I think we can start moving, there aren't many people around now, unlike at night.
It's dawn. Let's move out, it's relatively safe now.
Ah, guys! Finally, it's getting light...
Can anyone hear me? A group of our guys went missing tonight. They were supposed to be back by morning... Still not back. We're going out in an hour to search.
Guys, you should see the sunrise here in Bright Light. It's something... Both scary and beautiful...
Damn, I'm not going anywhere anymore...
Damn, guys, you can do as you please, but I'd rather spend the night in the bar...
I heard that at night, in the underground passages, lots of different anomalies appear near the Cordon...
It's starting to get dark... I'm not going anywhere...
Ah... no food again... I'll have to crawl into the underground at night, shoot rats...
It's better not to go to Bright Light right now, the whole city is flooded with zombies again... I don't even know how the Freedom fighters are holding up there...
So. What the hell was that?
Oh damn... what's happening here at night?
They've appeared again on the open channel. Happens.
Forgot to turn on encryption? Well, well...
Oh for god's sake... it's already creepy at night...
Again, some operations are being conducted.
It happens. Once I scanned frequencies and stumbled upon the conversations of military stalkers... you know, it's better for you not to know everything that's happening here. You'll sleep better.
Who could it be? Military? Scientists? Jokers? Or someone... else?
They conduct... quietly, so to speak... at night.
Yeah. Usually, it's rare for them to forget to close the frequencies.
Yeah... it's not like tales about the dark stalker... we have some kind of horror happening right under our noses...
Three people have settled in the garages... Everyone be careful, looks like those bandits are up to their old tricks again.

Recently, they caught Barkeep's courier at the checkpoint with goods... In short, the juicy bit is a crate with artifacts, somewhere near the checkpoint commander... So, if anyone is tired of living - might as well take the risk.
Attention everyone. To the north of the bridge at the checkpoint, about 100 meters past the abandoned APC, stumbled upon a cluster of electras... Whoever finds this info useful, the beer's on me.
Folks, the military has resumed patrols under the destroyed bridge at the checkpoint. Seems their sniper is stationed there... Didn't get a good look had to make a hasty retreat...
Actually, seems like there's nobody there...

Attention all... Bandits have set up shop again at the factory near the checkpoint. They're confiscating bribes from stalkers... If any seasoned ones are nearby, scare off those vermin... I won't rust from backing you up.
Seen a pack of dogs to the east of the bridge at the checkpoint, about 20-30 strong... So, gentlemen, draw your conclusions...
Dear stalkers... Urgently need a Magnet... Offering good money... Heard there's still one from the previous Emission somewhere near the checkpoint...
...Vaska says another marked one has appeared, just left the trader's. You know what to do...
Heard they saw the same in the swamps...
Someone took out Black Fedka in the garages... Damn, I sense those bandits are back.
Stay away from Dark Valley, loads of zombies are pouring out of there now, in droves... Preserve your ammo, damn it. Should've cleaned up the valley long ago. Where the hell is Duty looking?
Think I just saw a few fighters from Duty at the dump. Wonder who they're after?
...I'm in trouble, guys, I got snagged. If anyone's near the rusty lake, lend a hand, I won't rust from backing you up... Anyway, I'll try to get out myself, and we'll see from there.
Gunslinger is back! Just heard from reliable sources... Returned from the very center! Means we can, damn it, soon make a big breakthrough towards the center, and then we'll see who's who...
Attention all... Guys, don't head to the checkpoint... Some idiots have attacked the patrol... It's hot there now... Surely there'll be another punitive raid.
I'm at the Garbage, there's a ton of blind dogs running around... Seems like new packs came from the center, everyone be extra cautious.
Everyone be careful. Looks like the military has seriously entrenched themselves here. Their base is located in the institute building. Saw dozens of men and snipers on the roof.
Overheard from the patrol conversation that the military are hoarding everything they find on the third floor of the institute building. If anyone's willing to risk it for the loot - try to sneak in.

Heard someone walks around the factory at night... on the attic... When I passed by, saw a silhouette through a hole in the roof, about two meters tall... They say that place is... as if bringing bad luck to whoever visits...
Saw some scientist at the Institute, in an orange outfit... Hanging around the swamp with some weird canisters... What do they need there? It's all radioactive there...
The Toad ran out of food again... or pinched... Have to chase rats and crows again...
Chase away - chase away, you'll practice your aim...
They say some rookies settled in at the Bar... been hanging around there for a week without drying out... Huh, gotta check it out.
Just regular boozers, what can you expect from them...
What the hell? Went to my stash for artifacts, and there's nothing there! Damn, probably the blowout swallowed the last one...
Huh, turns out zombies have decayed so much that they can explode into pieces from a powerful blast! Just like from an anomaly!
Saw a military quad coming from the direction of the valley at the dump... everyone stay on guard.
Hey, what's with the boarded-up house at the Bar? Wouldn't be a bad idea to settle in there...
I heard someone died there a long time ago...
Noticed something spiky in one of the tunnels at the dump, like an artifact, but clearly out of reach...
Guys, help me out! Went into some complex in Dark Valley, and the door closed behind me.
Man, forgive the swearing, but... you're screwed.
Listen up, if anyone's in Dark Valley, get off the road, or else they'll run you over. Just had a truck pass by me. Looks like another corpse truck from the North.
Damn, where do they keep coming from? Anyone know?

They say some rookie occasionally crashes at the Toad's at night... Meanwhile, Toad goes to another room, and he just stands there all night, silent.. Heh, seems like the kid got completely hammered, that's why the Toad's roof is sagging...
Who knows, damn it... anything's possible.

Damn, spent the night yesterday in Light Beam in one of the Khrushchyovkas, and flesh suddenly appeared out of nowhere.. right into my dorm. And what's strange, it wandered around the rooms a bit, sniffed, and muttered something to itself... probably got hammered at the bar yesterday...
Has anyone seen headless zombies? I haven't myself, but they say there are such... How can they even exist like that?
Go to the lake, ask the scientists.
People, what should we do with radioactive rubble? Heard someone buys them up north, but how do we transport them? They emit so much radiation, they're practically glowing!
Buy an R1 capsule from the traders, put them in there. What rookies these days...
Damn, guys... bandits clashed with Duty at the dump... you gotta see this. At their checkpoint.
Oh, I'll drop some goodies in the stash and come right over.
Damn, got a flat tire on the bumpy road, and looks like the transmission's shot - it won't move at all... gotta walk two on foot now.
Saw the Bartender going into his locked room at night, and he's got a whole arsenal in there. There's a bunch of rifles hanging on the wall. If only we could get in there...
Don't bother coming to the Bar anymore. Security.
Buying a couple of cans for aspic. Heard you can collect it, make a concentrate.
Go talk to the Witcher, he seems to be into that stuff.
: An interesting stalker has appeared here, without a nickname... From now on, you'll be called -
: That's it! To hell with this zone, I'm outta here!
%c[255,160,181,169]Major Kravtsov:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hey, spoke with your buddy, good job. Come see me too, we need to talk...
WARNING, SAVE CORRUPTED! (actor pstor WAS EMPTY) RELOAD FROM PREVIOUS SAVE! - [
!!!!WARNING, pstor ACTOR EMPTY, SAVE CORRUPTED! RELOAD FROM PREVIOUS SAVE! - [
, the one looking for the Monolith, actually got into the sarcophagus at the station... Who knows...
, a gloomy guy who hated everything and everyone, somehow ended up behind the station... What he was doing there - who knows.
disappeared somewhere in the Cordon... They say he sold a bunch of artifacts, really needed the money... Seems like he left the zone...
disappeared somewhere in the north... They say he was an experienced tourist...
left the Zone... Heard he wanted to get revenge on someone here, and it seems he succeeded... got his revenge.
left the Zone... Heard he was searching for himself here... and apparently found himself.
: Well, I feel like there's nothing left for me to do in the zone. I'm outta here!
Order from Snitch at the bar: kill a stalker -
Order from the Toad: kill a stalker -
: Guys... I just saw it myself... Messer, the one from the death truck, was eating some strange piece of meat! Be careful.
heavily irradiated... It's not wise to keep it on self for too long...
: Bought a good gun at the bar. Highly recommended!
The mobile base at Lake Yanov received from a stalker
a batch of artifacts. Samples are available for sale. Interested parties should contact the Professor.
PSI emission gauge: Measurement started, do not switch measurement phases! Current phase -
PSI emission gauge: Starting next cycle. Current phase -
Looks like this artifact is very dangerous... A container is needed.
Open door (f) Change accumulator (b) Refuel (n) Push (Tab)
To cook food, you need to take the necessary ingredient in your hand and press the action button. To extinguish, press TAB.
To cook food, you need to take the necessary ingredient in your hand and press the action button. To extinguish, press TAB.
Last signal of infected scientist group
Damn, got hit... need to use a medkit.
Ah, blood is pouring... need a medkit.
Hey guys, who bought a new car?
Interesting car standing... is it free?
Hmm... a car. Looks like it's free...
Stalkers, attention everyone! Emission is approaching!
Attention! Scientists from Yantar reported that the emission will happen any minute!
Attention everyone! Looks like an emission is approaching! Hide while there's time!
Emission incoming! Repeat, everyone, emission approaching!
Need to eliminate a dangerous mutant. Last known location -
Task accepted to eliminate a dangerous mutant.
Will buy for a good price
The Scientific Complex will buy for a good price
The Scientific Complex requires for research
The Scientific Complex requires for research
I think I've had too much to drink...
Is he alive? Looks like a zombie...
What the... is that a child? What is he doing here?
What the... what kind of creature is this?
Hey, have you lost your mind shooting near my bunker?
What the hell are you shooting here for?
This is my lucky day... Found
Who wants to trade? I'm here -
If anyone wants to trade, I'm here -
I have goods for sale. Find me here -
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]But you see me... I would like to talk on equal terms.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]We don't want to answer that question.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]You don't know?... If we give you all the papers, will you leave?
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]You'll probably deceive us... We... we won't give you anything.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Brother! Come quickly, comrade's dying, I need your help! Follow me, hurry! Looks like a bloodsucker dragged him, please help me!
Ah, so you decided to check the notices after all?
I heard there's also a board like this in the Bar, by the way... Notices get updated a couple of times a day, both here and there. Everything available right now is my orders.
If you get the job done, come to me, we'll talk about payment.
Stashed the mini-PC near the western complex, in the basement. Seems like dwarves have settled there, which is good - hardly anyone will go there now.
Damn, stupid PDA stopped working again.
